Minifig290,"2018-02-20T12:43:09.007Z","SHE IS MINDBLOWING","

Soccer Mom Batgirl is part of the LEGO Minifigures Batman Movie Series 2 and is either the best or one of the best from the 20 in the series and for £
column2: 3 she is one of the most price worthy figure from the series.

column1: The figure herself is great. Her face print has a bat print on it. Her hat is an excellent mold that has a bat signal print and is nice and curve. She has a great tracksuit that has Batman'
column2: s face with a yellow font text reading &quot
column4: that could be used outside the Batman&nbsp
column6: fan or at a shop. Her cape and belt are the only parts that are not exclusive to the figure but are cool to get in a cheap set.

column2: only two accessories but they are some fantastic prints to represent bat money. Also there is a figure stand that has the Batman symbol printed on it.

column1: To finish this review of a small figure i would recommend all Batman
column2: fans to get this figure and if you collect Minifigure series to get the entire series as well like I will.
Great exclusive prints for her 1x2 tiles, face, torso, legs and hat

column3: t got a cool fan club&nbsp
column4: print on it and also the &pound
column5: 3 price is a hard pill to&nbsp

,TRUE,5,5,5,5,5 Lobo_da_boss_","2020-08-23T11:45:39.33Z","Very good variant unlike the other batgirl of the series ","

Opening
Soccer mom batgirl is a figure that I don'
column2: t fully understand the title of but it is still one of my favourites of the series .

column1: The hood is very nicely moulded and has a printed Batman emblem , the head has an inappropriate happy face and an appropriate annoyed face , the cape is just a standard Batman cape just smaller , the torso has nice front printing but nothing on the back , she has the standard belt in yellow and nicely printed legs and the arms are also very well printed .

column2: 2 printed black tile batbucks . Her stand is just the standard Lego Batman movie series two printed Batman emblem piece .

column1: this is a great figure I just wish it had back torso printing however I still recommend it .

,TRUE,5,3,1,3,5 Odeinoichus","2020-12-08T19:28:14.14Z","Bad Naming Choice Batman.","

Set #71020 Soccer Mom Batgirl:
column2: I could have sworn she had a different official name, but here comes Batgirl dressed in a hood and cape with Batman Merch logos all over. And #1 Batfan.
s more liked for her parts than her actual overall look. Her face has a nice set of expressions with happy and angry looks, and she&#39
column4: s own currency. Even the utility belt piece has a use, but while the parts are nice I&#39
column5: m still more partial to the complete Minifigure and this one is rock solid despite the poor choice in official names.

column2: d recommend her for the figure and strongly recommend her for the selection of parts. Strongly Recommended.
